deviceName.label: Name your device (names are sortable and filterable):

regToken.label: Enter the registration key displayed by the app on the device awaiting registration.  To protect your club's data, do not share this key with anyone else!

createClubDeviceForm.legend: Onboard a new device to your club:

forgetMe.text: We are very sad to see you go. Clicking the button below will delete your club, all its data, and your account. You will no longer be able to sign in.

confirm.labelAfter: " into the field below to enable the button.

forgetMe.accountDeleted: Your account has been deleted; you should now be logged out.

problemWithLastSubmission: There was a problem with your last submission:
